tweet: "We see a significant opportunity in leveraging Viacom‚Äôs global operating footprint to drive Pluto TV‚Äôs growth. To that end, we are currently launching the @PlutoTV offering in Switzerland & expanding Pluto TV in the UK, Germany & Austria, where it is already launched." -BB $VIAB

tweet: "On May 1st, we launched Viacom library content on @PlutoTV in a big way, adding 14 new channels, with more to come. name: ViacomCBS
tweet: "For Viacom, @PlutoTV was always more than a D2C play. We also saw it as an opportunity to broaden our partnerships with existing distributors and our early experience has proven just that." - BB $VIAB

name: ViacomCBS
tweet: "With @PlutoTV, we now reach 80% of all 18-34‚Äôs in the U.S. across our linear, digital and social products. This is the broadest reach we have ever had and with this growth comes greater value for our advertising partners and for Viacom." - BB $VIAB

name: ViacomCBS
tweet: "@PlutoTV has instantly added billions of ad impressions per month to the Viacom portfolio and these are high-value impressions. The audience skews young and is diverse. And the impressions are overwhelmingly delivered on the TV glass in long form, premium content." - BB $VIAB

tweet: "Viacom‚Äôs activity in mobile also continues to grow outside the U.S.  In fact, @VIMN_PR now has 22 mobile-only content deals with 18 operators across 30-plus countries ‚Äì a clear sign that our flagship brands are gaining significant traction on mobile networks." - BB $VIAB
